summary.span: 表示包含多个项的控件，这些项共享屏幕上的同一空间。

span.span: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于将降至最低屏幕空间使用情况，同时允许应用程序公开大量的数据。The is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data. A由多个对象共享相同的屏幕空间。A consists of multiple objects that share the same screen space. 只有一个中一次处于可见。Only one in a is visible at a time. 当用户选择的选项卡，该内容变得可见和其他内容对象中隐藏。When a user selects the tab of a , the contents of that become visible and the contents of the other objects are hidden. 是，这意味着它可以包含的任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## 自定义 TabControl 控件Customizing the TabControl Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[TabControl 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并将绑定在第二个到中第一个。The following example creates a and binds the in the second to a in the first . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ContentStringFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果 对象的内容显示为字符串，应如何设置这些内容的格式。

span.span: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果 对象的内容显示为字符串，应如何设置这些内容的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果你设置或的、忽略属性。If you set the or of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定到的集合`Student`对象。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`类具有`Name`属性的一个集合`Course`对象，并实现方法来返回`Name`学生或列出学生的课程的字符串。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 该示例使用要置于学生的名称每个(其继承自)，和显示的内容中的每个学生课程列表。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下面的示例实现方法来返回`Name`学生或列出学生的课程的字符串。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ ContentTemplateSelector { System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为选择用于显示控件内容的模板提供自定义逻辑的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
A .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，你创建时有多个为同一类型的对象，并且您想要提供您自己逻辑来选择将基于每个数据对象的属性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意，是否你有不同类型的对象，你可以设置属性。Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the property on the . 如果你做，则无需创建。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果你有相同类型的但具有不同的属性的对象，还可以考虑使用或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要创建一个模板选择器，创建一个类继承自，并重写方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 定义类后，你可以将类的实例分配给您的元素的模板选择器属性。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果这两个和设置属性，则将忽略此属性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该控件将引发通过调用的事件。The control raises the event by calling . 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Provides data for .

summary.span: 为用户按任意键时引发的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据的`true`当用户按下 CTRL + TAB、 CTRL + SHIFT + TAB，主页或最终间导航对象。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between objects. 否则，此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (属性) 的事件数据。Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果你重写，始终调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
